content: add <userid> Add a new user ID direct dirm for <userid> dir for <userid> setpw lbyonly Modify the user ID’s password to restricted access dirm for <userid> get Receive a copy of user ID direct on your reader in order you can modify any user ID definitions dirm for <userid> replace Replace the modified copy of user ID direct dirm for <userid> purge Purge a user ID and all its resources defined on directory dirm for <userid> amd Add an MDisk on the user ID direct dirm for <userid> cmd Change the MDisk size or location dirm for <userid> dmd Delete MDisk, this MDisk is deleted immediately dirm status workunit Status of a workunit (request) dirm workunit <number> retry Retry a workunit (request) dirm workunit <number> wakeup Wakeup a request (workunit) dirm workunit <number> cancel Cancel a request (workunit) Note: These shutdown commands are disruptive. Chapter 10. DirMaint, RACF-connector, and SMAPI 343 DASD management dirm dasd query group * Get the DASD groups defined on EXTENT CONTROL
